Degenerate.NAME: Degenerate
Degenerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this doesn't cost 0, Add a copy of this card to your discard pile that costs 1 less and does !M! damage.

Assess.NAME: Assess
Assess.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, draw !M! cards.

Feint.NAME: Feint
Feint.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to debuff you, gain !M! artifact and !B! block.

Intolerance.NAME: Intolerance
Intolerance.DESCRIPTION: If you discard this card, take 3 damage.

Notoriety.NAME: Notoriety
Notoriety.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, enemies gain !M! Thorns.

Hatred.NAME: Hatred
Hatred.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, enemies gain 1 Strength.

BlessedFruit.NAME: Blessed Fruit
BlessedFruit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Max Health. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

CloudedMind.NAME: Clouded Mind
CloudedMind.DESCRIPTION: If you exhaust this card, add a random colorless card to your hand.

Reforge.NAME: Reforge
Reforge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand. Cards already upgraded cost 1 less to play. NL Exhaust
Reforge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand. Cards already upgraded cost 1 less to play.
